name: Electrode
description: The Ball Pokémon. Stores electrical energy inside its body. Even the slightest shock could trigger a huge explosion.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to sound-based moves.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a melee attack, roll a d4. On a result of 4, the attacker takes an amount of electric damage equal to this Pokemon's proficiency bonus.

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.description: This Pokémon deals damage to an attacker equal to half of the damage received when knocked out by a melee move.
